overview: This film features some of the most important living Postmodern practitioners, Charles Jencks, Robert A M Stern and Sir Terry Farrell among them, and asks them how and why Postmodernism came about, and what it means to be Postmodern.  This film was originally made for the V&A exhibition 'Postmodernism: Style and Subversion 1970 - 1990'.
title: Postmodernism: The Substance of Style
